content.rendered:
THE MAZDA BT50 3D EVOLUTION FRONT BAR IS NOW AVAILABLE FOR ORDER

The Evolution Bumper is finished in a hard-wearing flat black Powder coat or can be colour coded as an option. All our parts are now zinc plated before powder coating to ensure a long rust free life. They are a 3mm and 6mm steel construction and includes as standard a 5mm Aluminium bash plate not offered on other brands. The middle winch plate insert comes standard in Black or can be optioned as stainless steel or colour coded with the rest of the bar. We also offer as standard, LED foglights which are an extra on many other brands. Our bars are individually designed for each vehicle so as you can see look amazing without sticking way out and looking boxy.

-The Evolution bumpers have carried out many dynamic crash tests here in Australia to ensure it complements the existing safety systems for example Air bags. Crash testing is vital to ensure your air bags fire when they should. When comparing bars ensure dynamic crash testing is carried out for your safety. During install the Standard bumper on your vehicle gets removed completely and can be saved / sold.

Includes: The below are included items that are charged as extra on other brands

Winch mount (no additional brackets required)

Integrated LED Fog lights

5mm Aluminum Bash / Protection plate (Not just a thin short stone shield)

2 x Vehicle recovery points

Hinged number plate bracket to access winch area / Fairlead
Optional

Can be colour coded to match your vehicle

Middle winch plate insert can be optioned in stainless steel

Shackles

Winch

Spotlight mounting bar

excerpt.rendered:
RHINO BAR SUIT MAZDA BT50 2011-2021

Please note: Depending on stock & availability, the current wait time for this product is approx. 30 – 90 days from date of order.
